Â 
I get several popup windows with this error when i try to open my saved chars. Saves were created in v.2.2.7 and last handled in v.2.2.16.

Comments.Message: Try re-creating your character file from 2.2.19, I'm able to see the error on mine and will try to track down the problem.

So the problem is that the Ability Maintenance tree wasn't being populated before another change was occurring in a separate thread. I moved the cause of the separate threads to down below the point where it will be for sure pop'd and it stopped having the issue.

Recreating your character file in 2.2.19 would fix the issue as well, versions moving forward shouldn't have this crash either with older files.
